Edge Case Annotations.Zero Value Participation: If a participant sends an amount other than TICKET_AMOUNT, the assertion fails.

Edge Case Annotations.Low Participation: If there are fewer participants, the pot will be smaller, reducing the potential jackpot.

Common Attack Patterns.Time Manipulation: The random selection method is based on block timestamp, making it vulnerable to manipulation by miners. This is flagged at the point of randomness generation.

Common Attack Patterns.Access Control Vulnerability: None present in this contract, but if unauthorized access to the bank account was allowed, it would be flagged.

Recovery Mechanisms: None implemented. An emergency pause function could be used to halt the lottery in the event of an attack.
